Francesca Ekwuyasi bụ onye odee Naijiria na Canada, nakwa onye na-ese ihe. A maara ya nke ọma maka akwụkwọ mbụ ya bụ Butter Honey Pig Bread, nke e bipụtara na 2020.

Ọ bụ onye Lagos, Nigeria, ọ nọ ugbu a na Halifax, Nova Scotia. N'igbakwunye na edemede ya, o nwere ihe ngosi nke akwụkwọ nka na Halifax's The Khyber na 2019, ma duzie obere ihe nkiri gụnyere Reconcile na Black & Belonging

A họpụtara Butter Honey Pig Bread maka mbipụta 2021 nke Canada Reads, ebe onye isi nri ama ama bụ Roger Mooking gbachitere ya. E depụtara akwụkwọ ahụ maka 2020 Giller Prize, ma depụta ya maka 2021 Lambda Literary Award for Lesbian Fiction, 2021 ReLit Award for fiction, Amazon.ca First Novel Award na 2020 Governor General's Award for English fiction.
Ọ na-akọwa dị ka onye na-abụghị nwoke ma ọ bụ nwanyị.
